1: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> יַכְרִ֞ית <sup>3772 </sup> <n>hath cut off</n> יְהוָ֤ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>When the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>the nations</n> אֲשֶׁר֙ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whose</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> נֹתֵ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>giveth</n> לְךָ֖ אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אַרְצָ֑ם <sup>776 </sup> <n>whose land</n> וִֽירִשְׁתָּ֕ם <sup>3423 </sup> <n>thee and thou succeedest</n> וְיָשַׁבְתָּ֥ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>them and dwellest</n> בְעָרֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>5892 </sup> <n>in their cities</n> וּבְבָתֵּיהֶֽם׃ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>and in their houses</n>
2: שָׁל֥וֹשׁ <sup>7969 </sup> <n>three</n> עָרִ֖ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> תַּבְדִּ֣יל <sup>914 </sup> <n>Thou shalt separate</n> לָ֑ךְ בְּת֣וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>for thee in the midst</n> אַרְצְךָ֔ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of thy land</n> אֲשֶׁר֙ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> נֹתֵ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>giveth</n> לְךָ֖ לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>thee to possess</n>
3: תָּכִ֣ין <sup>3559 </sup> <n>Thou shalt prepare</n> לְךָ֮ הַדֶּרֶךְ֒ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>thee a way</n> וְשִׁלַּשְׁתָּ֙ <sup>8027 </sup> <n>into three parts</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> גְּב֣וּל <sup>1366 </sup> <n>and divide the coasts</n> אַרְצְךָ֔ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of thy land</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יַנְחִֽילְךָ֖ <sup>5157 </sup> <n>giveth thee to inherit</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> וְהָיָ֕ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לָנ֥וּס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>may flee</n> שָׁ֖מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>any</n> רֹצֵֽחַ׃ <sup>7523 </sup> <n>that every slayer</n>
4: וְזֶה֙ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>now this</n> דְּבַ֣ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>And this [is] the case</n> הָרֹצֵ֔חַ <sup>7523 </sup> <n>of the slayer</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> יָנ֥וּס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>which shall flee</n> שָׁ֖מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> וָחָ֑י <sup>2425 </sup> <n>thither that he may live</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>when</n> יַכֶּ֤ה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>Whoso killeth</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <sup>7453 </sup> <n>his neighbour</n> בִּבְלִי־ <sup>1097 </sup> <n>corruption</n> דַ֔עַת <sup>1847 </sup> <n>cunning</n> וְה֛וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> שֹׂנֵ֥א <sup>8130 </sup> <n>whom he hated</n> ל֖וֹ מִתְּמֹ֥ל <sup>8543 </sup> <n>not in time</n> שִׁלְשֹֽׁם׃ <sup>8032 </sup> <n>past</n>
5: וַאֲשֶׁר֩ <sup>834 </sup> <n>when</n> יָבֹ֨א <sup>935 </sup> <n>As when a man goeth</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> רֵעֵ֥הוּ <sup>7453 </sup> <n>with his neighbour</n> בַיַּעַר֮ <sup>3293 </sup> <n>into the wood</n> לַחְטֹ֣ב <sup>2404 </sup> <n>to hew</n> עֵצִים֒ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>wood</n> וְנִדְּחָ֨ה <sup>5080 </sup> <n>fetcheth a stroke</n> יָד֤וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>and his hand</n> בַגַּרְזֶן֙ <sup>1631 </sup> <n>with the axe</n> לִכְרֹ֣ת <sup>3772 </sup> <n>to cut down</n> הָעֵ֔ץ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>the tree</n> וְנָשַׁ֤ל <sup>5394 </sup> <n>slippeth</n> הַבַּרְזֶל֙ <sup>1270 </sup> <n>and the head</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> הָעֵ֔ץ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>from the helve</n> וּמָצָ֥א <sup>4672 </sup> <n>and lighteth</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רֵעֵ֖הוּ <sup>7453 </sup> <n>upon his neighbour</n> וָמֵ֑ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>that he die</n> ה֗וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יָנ֛וּס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>he shall flee</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אַחַ֥ת <sup>259 </sup> <n>unto one</n> הֶעָרִים־ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of those cities</n> הָאֵ֖לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>of these</n> וָחָֽי׃ <sup>2425 </sup> <n>and live</n>
6: פֶּן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>otherwise</n> יִרְדֹּף֩ <sup>7291 </sup> <n>pursue</n> גֹּאֵ֨ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>Lest the avenger</n> הַדָּ֜ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>of the blood</n> אַחֲרֵ֣י <sup>310 </sup> <n>after that</n> הָרֹצֵ֗חַ <sup>7523 </sup> <n>the manslayer</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>while</n> יֵחַם֮ <sup>3179 </sup> <n>is hot</n> לְבָבוֹ֒ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>his heart</n> וְהִשִּׂיג֛וֹ <sup>5381 </sup> <n>and overtake</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>inasmuch as</n> יִרְבֶּ֥ה <sup>7235 </sup> <n>is long</n> הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>him because the way</n> וְהִכָּ֣הוּ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>and slay</n> נָ֑פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>him</n> וְלוֹ֙ אֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>was not</n> מִשְׁפַּט־ <sup>4941 </sup> <n>whereas he [was] not worthy</n> מָ֔וֶת <sup>4194 </sup> <n>of death</n> כִּ֠י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>since</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>had not</n> שֹׂנֵ֥א <sup>8130 </sup> <n>he hated</n> ה֛וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> ל֖וֹ מִתְּמ֥וֹל <sup>8543 </sup> <n>him not in time</n> שִׁלְשֽׁוֹם׃ <sup>8032 </sup> <n>past</n>
7: עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּ֛ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> אָנֹכִ֥י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> מְצַוְּךָ֖ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>Wherefore I command</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>thee saying</n> שָׁלֹ֥שׁ <sup>7969 </sup> <n>three</n> עָרִ֖ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> תַּבְדִּ֥יל <sup>914 </sup> <n>Thou shalt separate</n> לָֽךְ׃ ס
8: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> יַרְחִ֞יב <sup>7337 </sup> <n>enlarge</n> יְהוָ֤ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And if the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> גְּבֻ֣לְךָ֔ <sup>1366 </sup> <n>thy coast</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> נִשְׁבַּ֖ע <sup>7650 </sup> <n>as he hath sworn</n> לַאֲבֹתֶ֑יךָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>unto thy fathers</n> וְנָ֤תַן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and give</n> לְךָ֙ אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>thee all the land</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> דִּבֶּ֖ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>which he promised</n> לָתֵ֥ת <sup>5414 </sup> <n>to give</n> לַאֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>1 </sup> <n>unto thy fathers</n>

16: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>If</n> יָק֥וּם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>rise up</n> עֵד־ <sup>5707 </sup> <n>witness</n> חָמָ֖ס <sup>2555 </sup> <n>If a false</n> בְּאִ֑ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>against any man</n> לַעֲנ֥וֹת <sup>6030 </sup> <n>to testify</n> בּ֖וֹ סָרָֽה׃ <sup>5627 </sup> <n>against him [that which is] wrong</n>

18: וְדָרְשׁ֥וּ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>inquisition</n> הַשֹּׁפְטִ֖ים <sup>8199 </sup> <n>And the judges</n> הֵיטֵ֑ב <sup>3190 </sup> <n>shall make diligent</n> וְהִנֵּ֤ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and if</n> עֵֽד־ <sup>5707 </sup> <n>and behold [if] the witness</n> שֶׁ֙קֶר֙ <sup>8267 </sup> <n>[be] a false</n> הָעֵ֔ד <sup>5707 </sup> <n>witness</n> שֶׁ֖קֶר <sup>8267 </sup> <n>falsely</n> עָנָ֥ה <sup>6030 </sup> <n>[and] hath testified</n> בְאָחִֽיו׃ <sup>251 </sup> <n>against his brother</n>
19: וַעֲשִׂ֣יתֶם <sup>6213 </sup> <n>Then shall ye do</n> ל֔וֹ כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>he</n> זָמַ֖ם <sup>2161 </sup> <n>unto him as he had thought</n> לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <sup>6213 </sup> <n>to have done</n> לְאָחִ֑יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>unto his brother</n> וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֥ <sup>1197 </sup> <n>away</n> הָרָ֖ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>the evil</n> מִקִּרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <sup>7130 </sup> <n>from among</n>
20: וְהַנִּשְׁאָרִ֖ים <sup>7604 </sup> <n>And those which remain</n> יִשְׁמְע֣וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>shall hear</n> וְיִרָ֑אוּ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>and fear</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and will never</n> יֹסִ֨פוּ <sup>3254 </sup> <n>and shall henceforth</n> לַעֲשׂ֜וֹת <sup>6213 </sup> <n>commit</n> ע֗וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> כַּדָּבָ֥ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>no more any</n> הָרָ֛ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>such evil</n> הַזֶּ֖ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>such</n> בְּקִרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <sup>7130 </sup> <n>among</n>
21: וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תָח֖וֹס <sup>2347 </sup> <n>shall not pity</n> עֵינֶ֑ךָ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>And thine eye</n> נֶ֣פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>[but] life</n> בְּנֶ֗פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>[shall go] for life</n> עַ֤יִן <sup>5869 </sup> <n>eye</n> בְּעַ֙יִן֙ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>for eye</n> שֵׁ֣ן <sup>8127 </sup> <n>tooth</n> בְּשֵׁ֔ן <sup>8127 </sup> <n>for tooth</n> יָ֥ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>hand</n> בְּיָ֖ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>for hand</n> רֶ֥גֶל <sup>7272 </sup> <n>foot</n> בְּרָֽגֶל׃ <sup>7272 </sup> <n>for foot</n> ס
